name: Five Nights at Tattletail 'n Bendy 3
description:
Five Nights at Tattletail 'n Bendy 3

When, after all those years, the children free themselves, it is now the time for the murderer to suffer. "Welcome to hell, where you will have to be a night guard forever!"-those words greet Dave as he approaches a simple old-fashioned chair.
Then the night shift begins...

Tattletail belongs to Waygetter Electronics

Bendy belongs to Joey Drew Studios Inc.

FNaF belongs to Scott Cawthon
